shortContent:
Other creatures within
range, and that succeed on a Difficult (–10) Awareness
Test, may detect the curious keening.
content:
A creature with this trait perceives its surroundings by emitting
a frequency noise, allowing the creature to locate the position
of any solid object within 30 metres. Other creatures within
range, and that succeed on a Difficult (–10) Awareness
Test, may detect the curious keening.
